tag_list: fromthisseat-com, tickets, sports, nhl, nba, mlb, nfl, broker
overview: John Raso is the creator and owner of FromThisSeat.com, a website that allows sports fans to blog about the seats they had at NHL, NFL, NBA and MLB games; every section of every stadium. In exchange, other fans will have perspectives to help them decide which tickets to purchase for the game. FromThisSeat also features a ticket broker directory and will list their coupon codes for the public.
